5th International Conference on Control
Dynamic Systems and Robotics (CDSR'18)

June 7 - 9, 2018 | Niagara Falls, Canada

5th International Conference on Control
Dynamic Systems, and Robotics (CDSR'18)

June 7 - 9, 2018 | Niagara Falls, Canada

Submissions

·

Important Dates

·

Registration

Search:

  • Sponsors & Exhibitors
  • Symposium & Workshop
  • Submit your Paper


We are pleased to announce that the 5th International Conference of Control, Dynamic Systems, and Robotics (CDSR'18) will be held at the Americana Conference Resort, Spa & Waterpark.

A list of hotels within the walking distance from the conference venue is available below. Please note that the reservations must be made individually directly by either phone or online at a specific hotel. We suggest to make your reservations as early as possible to get the best discount and to avoid any toursit rush.

Hotels Stars Driving Distance
to Venue		 Directions
Americana Conference Resort, Spa & Waterpark 3 ★ - -
Best Western Plus Cairn Croft Hotel 3 ★ 5 min. Directions
Super 8 Niagara Falls 2 ★ 7 min. Directions
Ramada Plaza Niagara Falls 3 ★ 8 min. Directions
DoubleTree Fallsview Resort & Spa by Hilton 4 ★ 9 min. Directions
Wyndham Garden Niagara Falls Fallsview 3 ★ 9 min. Directions
Best Western Fallsview 3 ★ 10 min. Directions
Four Points by Sheraton Niagara Falls Fallsview 4 ★ 11 min. Directions
Embassy Suites by Hilton Niagara Falls 4 ★ 11 min. Directions
Marriott on the Falls 4 ★ 11 min. Directions
